abilities.name: Inspiring Exemplar
abilities.rule: Each time this model destroys an enemy **CHARACTER** model in the Fight phase, you gain 1CP and until the end of the battle, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its Nemesis force weapon.

abilities.name: Clarion of Haste
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
